metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11624 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
A stack-consumption vulnerability was found in libqpdf in QPDF 6.0.0, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file, related to the QPDFTokenizer::resolveLiteral function in QPDFTokenizer.cc after two consecutive calls to QPDFObjectHandle::parseInternal, aka an "infinite loop."

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11624` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqpdf21 - 8.0.2-3~16.04.1
qpdf - 8.0.2-3~16.04.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> fixed by one of the other infinite loop CVEs

criterions.comment: qpdf package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.0.2-3~16.04.1').
